subject: Delayed Shipment
description_text:
Dear Simsonn,
I'm writing to you for the second time to inform you that UPS hasn't
received my package yet, and more than 10 days have passed already since
you created a label for this shipment. I'd like to know what's happened to
my order and if I'm actually going to receive it any time soon, or
otherwise, how should I proceed for an eventual refund.
I hope to hear news from you very soon.
Order #SSN1703, Tracking Number 1Z14V4W16894618303.
Best regards
Andrea Perfetto

conversations.body_text: Hi Andrea Perfetto,    We are investigating this matter for you, please don't worry, if there is an accident we will use ups courier to send you a replacement, sorry for the inconvenience.
